question: US recognizes Reza Pahlavi as leader of Iran before August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Trump administration announces that the United States officially recognizes Reza Pahlavi as the "leader of Iran" by July 31, 2025 ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Roles that could qualify for "leader of Iran" status include, but are not limited to, "head of state," "prime minister," or other similar roles that give him primary executive authority in the territory of Iran.

A qualifying US statement must be direct and unqualified. Conditional, hypothetical, supportive, or implied statements do not count.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government and Donald Trump, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government and Donald Trump, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Pacers vs. Thunder
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for June 16 at 8:30PM ET:
If the Indiana Pacers win, the market will resolve to “Pacers”.
If the Oklahoma City Thunder win, the market will resolve to “Thunder”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

description:

question: Will Reza Pahlavi enter Iran before September?
description:
If Reza Pahlavi visits Iran between June 14, and August 31, 2025 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a "visit" is defined as Reza Pahlavi physically entering the terrestrial territory of Iran. Whether or not Reza Pahlavi enters Iranian airspace or maritime territory during the timeframe of this market will have no bearing on a positive resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be between $105K and $106K on June 15 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
